SEARCH
Package additional

Class UniversityJournal

java.lang.Object
additional.UniversityJournal
public class UniversityJournal extends Object
The UniversityJournal class represents a journal that publishes research papers within a university. It allows users to subscribe as observers to receive updates when new research papers are published.

  • Constructor Summary
